2015.context: nCino, Inc. is a cloud banking platform company focused on bank operating system for lending, account opening, and deposits. Founded on Salesforce platform. Commercial lending focus.

competitors.name: Temenos
competitors.notes: Swiss banking software provider with comprehensive core banking and loan origination solutions

competitors.name: Finastra (formerly Misys)
competitors.notes: Major banking software provider offering loan origination and core banking systems

competitors.name: FIS (Fidelity National Information Services)
competitors.notes: Large financial services technology provider with banking and lending solutions

competitors.name: Jack Henry & Associates
competitors.notes: Provider of core banking and lending technology for community banks and credit unions

competitors.name: Fiserv
competitors.notes: Financial services technology company offering core processing and lending solutions

competitors.name: Oracle Financial Services
competitors.notes: Banking platform provider with loan origination and banking solutions

competitors.name: Salesforce Financial Services Cloud
competitors.notes: CRM platform for financial services, competing in customer relationship management space

2020.context: nCino, Inc. is a cloud banking platform company focused on bank operating system for lending, account opening, and deposits. IPO. Digital banking transformation accelerated.

competitors.name: Finastra
competitors.notes: One of the largest fintech companies with comprehensive loan origination and core banking solutions

competitors.name: Temenos
competitors.notes: Leading banking software provider with cloud and on-premise solutions for retail and corporate banking

competitors.name: FIS
competitors.notes: Major provider of banking technology, payments, and core processing solutions

competitors.name: Jack Henry & Associates
competitors.notes: Technology solutions provider for community banks and credit unions with lending platforms

competitors.name: Fiserv
competitors.notes: Financial services technology offering core banking, digital banking, and lending solutions

competitors.name: Blend
competitors.notes: Digital lending platform focused on mortgage and consumer lending, competing in digital lending space

competitors.name: Ellie Mae (ICE Mortgage Technology)
competitors.notes: Mortgage origination software provider, acquired by Intercontinental Exchange in 2020

competitors.name: Q2 Holdings
competitors.notes: Digital banking and lending solutions provider for regional and community financial institutions

competitors.name: Salesforce Financial Services Cloud
competitors.notes: CRM platform for financial services, though nCino is built on Salesforce

2024.context: nCino, Inc. is a cloud banking platform company focused on bank operating system for lending, account opening, and deposits. AI-powered banking insights. Consumer and SMB expansion.

competitors.name: Temenos
competitors.notes: Global banking software leader with comprehensive cloud banking platform and loan origination solutions

competitors.name: Finastra
competitors.notes: Major fintech provider offering Fusion Loan Origination and comprehensive banking software suite

competitors.name: FIS
competitors.notes: Large banking technology provider with lending and core banking platforms

competitors.name: Q2 Holdings
competitors.notes: Digital banking and lending platform provider for regional and community financial institutions

competitors.name: Jack Henry & Associates
competitors.notes: Core banking and lending technology for community banks with cloud-based solutions

competitors.name: Fiserv
competitors.notes: Financial services technology with lending, core banking, and digital solutions

competitors.name: Blend Labs

competitors.name: ICE Mortgage Technology (Encompass)
competitors.notes: Mortgage origination platform, part of Intercontinental Exchange

competitors.name: Abrigo (formerly Sageworks)
competitors.notes: Lending and credit risk management software for community financial institutions

competitors.name: Salesforce Financial Services Cloud
competitors.notes: CRM and banking platform, though nCino is built on Salesforce platform

competitors.name: Mambu

2025.query: nCino competitors 2025 bank operating system cloud banking
2025.context: nCino, Inc. is a cloud banking platform company focused on bank operating system for lending, account opening, and deposits. Bank operating system leader. Competing with traditional core vendors.

competitors.name: Q2
competitors.notes: Top nCino alternative according to G2 2025 for cloud banking platforms.

competitors.name: Alkami
competitors.notes: Major cloud banking platform competitor, second-ranked alternative to nCino.

competitors.name: Razorpay
competitors.notes: Market share leader with 47.71% in banking tools category, significantly ahead of nCino's 0.21%.

competitors.name: Oracle Financial Services
competitors.notes: Second largest competitor by market share at 8.77% in banking category.

competitors.name: Temenos
competitors.notes: Major banking platform competitor with 4.85% market share. Temenos Infinity platform enables digital transformation for financial institutions.

competitors.name: Mambu
competitors.notes: Cloud-native SaaS core banking platform. Modular architecture for lending, deposits, payments. Enables building tailored financial ecosystems.

competitors.name: FIS Core Banking
competitors.notes: Agile solutions with componentized architecture serving community, mid-tier, large and global financial institutions.

competitors.name: Backbase
competitors.notes: Digital banking platform competing with nCino's engagement banking capabilities (The Engagement Banking Platform).

competitors.name: Finastra
competitors.notes: Range of banking and lending solutions competing with nCino's offerings.

competitors.name: TurnKey Lender
competitors.notes: AI-driven SaaS lending platform used in 50+ countries. Automates 90% of lending processes, reduces costs and risk.

competitors.name: Finacle Online Banking
competitors.notes: Banking platform alternative to nCino Cloud Banking Platform.

competitors.name: BaNCS
competitors.notes: Core banking solution competing with nCino.

competitors.name: Credit Lens
competitors.notes: Credit origination and decisioning platform, competing in lending space.

competitors.name: iDenfy
competitors.notes: Alternative to nCino for banking verification and compliance.
